website_summaries.verdict: A delightfully retro styled 3DS model that hardcore Nintendo enthusiasts will appreciate.
pros: Super Nintendo themed case is a must-have for retro game fans
Includes SNES classic Super Mario Kart, a large display
Able to download and play “New 3DS” exclusive games like EarthBound and Donkey Kong Country

website_summaries.verdict: The 3DS XL is the fastest, most powerful hardware available for Nintendo’s 2DS and 3DS games. If you’re looking for an engaging portable gaming system that has a lot of games and doesn’t take a long time to figure out, this is the one to get.
pros: The AC adapter is sold separately
At 11.6 ounces, it’s the heaviest product in the DS line of hardware
cons: Some reports that this console arrives with missing cables
Some buyers found that the buttons stick a little when playing

customer_reviews.title: Better than new 2ds xl
customer_reviews.text: It is of a much better build quality for an additional 50 dollars. I have a new 2ds xl but this is much heavier and you can tell it's of a tougher material and speakers in a better much better spot that don't get covered up when you hold it as well as the option to switch out the battery. It runs great and came quickly. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: dark tooth

customer_reviews.title: I love the look and you will always find a game ...
customer_reviews.text: Well, it's a 3ds with a SNES finish, I love the look and you will always find a game that interests you on the new 3ds, I've always been a big fan of Luigi's Mansion on gamecube so my main exclusive that I like on here is Luigi's Mansion Dark Moon, I'm also looking forward to the remake of Luigi's Mansion later this year. What more is there to say really it's a New 3DSXL with a Super NES finish works the same as all the others.
customer_reviews.author: K. Price

customer_reviews.title: This version doesn’t come with an AC Adapter, which you have to buy separately.
customer_reviews.text: The price reduction alone led me to upgrade from the original 3DS in glossy black. With the nostalgia of the classic matte finish in SNES throwback design plus the bigger screens makes this is a must-buy for any Nintendo fan. My only complaint is lack of an AC Adapter (battery charger) in the box; it seems greedy to exclude and charge extra for a required accessory, when not everyone will have a charger on hand already. The price drop more than compensates, however. Fully recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZON SUCKS
customer_reviews.text: Some pixels are not working in the top screen and Amazon refused to replace the device for me
customer_reviews.author: Abdullah Hashim

customer_reviews.title: Got a new system for the price of a gamestop refurb, can't beat that.
customer_reviews.text: Best bang for buck purchase, I've been shopping around for a new 3ds xl upgrade from my blue one (which I bought from gamestop, had touch screen problems). I saw the price for a refurb which is 149.99 (161.00 and some change with taxes and more with shipping) and purchasing through amazon was a much more budget friendly option. I wanted to get this one when I first saw an unboxing on youtube. being able to finally play snes games on the go for nostalgia is always a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Great Device, Great Value, Fun Experience
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this gaming device. I've owned the Atari 2600, Original Game Boy, Game Boy Advance SP, and the original Nintendo WII. This is my favorite. The value for the money is outstanding! I love the 3D mode too! Playing Mario Land 3D in 3D is a real treat and a unique game experience. I've also enjoyed playing other familiar titles such as Metroid and Zelda! Thanks Nintendo, great product :)
customer_reviews.author: iamtron

customer_reviews.title: Beatiful Console and for $150 - Bought!
customer_reviews.text: Nintendo makes the greatest gaming devices period. No one else comes close. Yes I own a PS4, an Xbox One, and a Switch...but nothing beats the DS line of products to me. It is hands down the best handheld gaming console ever made. With that said this SNES throw back is an amazing design. Nintendo should be proud. Amazon selling the New 3DS XL for $150 made me jump on this. Even to have as a collectors item this unit will definitely increase in value over the years. I really hope Nintendo continues to support this platform because there is a huge fan base that still loves our 3DS consoles.
customer_reviews.author: Jase

customer_reviews.title: So much nostalgia
customer_reviews.text: Even the box reminds me of the old SNES box! While it’s basically structurally the same as the 3DS, tho one seems slightly more ‘rounded’ in shape, and the case texture is smooth and slightly soft. It also now plays SNES games, and the whole reason I purchased this was to play Super Mario World. It looks/works amazing on this system. The game slot was moved to the front so it won’t get popped out as much, and their are 3 additional buttons to accommodate different games. The micro sd slot is harder to get to, as I have to unscrew a panel now to access it, but I solved this by using a card with more storage space.
customer_reviews.author: Great Kitsune

customer_reviews.title: The New 3DS XL Is Pretty Great
customer_reviews.text: The retro design is pretty great and the device is durable. I ended up with a "TN" screen and was about to return the device but honestly, once you're playing a game, it's hard to care too much about contrast ratio minutiae. "TN" screens are totally usable. That said, Nintendo's whole "screen lottery" is unfortunate. As far as the 3D functionality goes, I guess I'm in the minority who thinks it's a useful, cool feature. To be fair, the head-tracking on the New 3DS models is what makes the difference. 3D functionality on earlier models wasn't as good.
customer_reviews.author: ADJ

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome version of the New 3DS XL system. Comes with a free downloadable code of SNES Mario Kart. Quality is great. Both screens are bright. Great as a collector's item or for everyday use. This is very nostalgic to those who've owned an SNES. Does not come with power adapter, but not a deal breaker. Bought an adapter from Wal-Mart in-store for $6. Overall, great purchase. I'm extremely satisfied and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Mister Oakleys

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking 3DS
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the og cosmo black 3ds pretty much since it’s release, and I honestly didn’t play it much since the screen was so small. I don’t know how much life the 3ds platform has left but I bit the bullet anyway, since I love the way this snes version looks. This thing does not disappoint. I can’t put this thing down, I love it. I recommend a crystal clear TNP case to preserve the beauty of this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No charger, have fun running to the store within hours of purchase
customer_reviews.text: How can you sell a device that requires a custom charger (speaking of which, why doesn't this use USB like every mobile device) and not include that custom charger? This is not how you sell hardware. Out of the box, you can only play this for a few hours before you'll be running to the store to purchase a $10-15 cable because Nintendo chose to use a custom cable/charger and chose not to include that charger with the device. This is not acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Jason L

customer_reviews.title: Brand Trust
customer_reviews.text: Nintendo has always excelled at their products. With this (replacing a previous gen DS), we encountered a potential scare when not long after opening there was an issue. Contacted tech support and received PHENOMENAL customer service that led to a seamless shipment back for repair and eventual return of the DS. They love happy customers and are doing well to ensure that.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Great product the kid in everyone
customer_reviews.text: I may be old in the tooth but I wanted to get into playing games again and thought a handheld was the perfect solution. The screens are large and clear (I am not too crazy about the 3D part) and after a while you get used to the positioning of the buttons. If someone added the ability to text or phone to this gadget I would have the perfect mobile device. I highly recommend this - oh - kind of cool it looks like a SNES too!
customer_reviews.author: L. Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: Get a Switch Instead
customer_reviews.text: We have a Switch. A child wanted this 3DS XL, and spent their own money to buy it. Well, it doesn't get played very much at all. While the 3D feature is pretty cool, in my opinion, the graphics just aren't that great. The Switch is much cooler, has better graphics, and will be getting all the latest games. Other than battery life being much better on the 3DS XL, the Switch is the system to get.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Amazing System
customer_reviews.text: I passed on the DS originally, then passed on the 3DS until it's basically at end of life. But this New 3DS has the best 3D screen. In the original models I just couldn't see the 3D effect and I wasn't thrilled. Now the price is right and the system is fun. I only bought the system to play the new Metroid as well as all of the relevant Zelda's and it's definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Mistrblank

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Comes just the way it says! Fun gaming system!
customer_reviews.text: Received it just the way it says! In perfect condition! Everything works perfectly! This is such a fun system to play especially when you want to play old SNES games, you can just download them! Its crazy! Had to buy a adapter seperately because i didnt choose that option to get one. Fun system for all ages! 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy to see Nintendo has since fixed the problem and ...
customer_reviews.text: After switching to a 2DS XL and being unsatisfied with how it felt in my exceptionally large gorilla hands, I decided to get this SNES-inspired 3DS XL that when it retires, it can go on the shelf next to my NES GBA SP. After the frustration of stripping my screws on my launch New 3DS XL back when it came out, I'm happy to see Nintendo has since fixed the problem and swapping over my SD card was nothing at all.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Dearing

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product & seller
customer_reviews.text: Even better in person. This has so many features that are just like the Super Nintendo system it's crazy! No detail was left not thought of. I was also very impressed with this seller. They even included a free pair of headphones with a little insert thanking us for supporting their business.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it and it works great
customer_reviews.text: Made my friends jelly with the design. I love it and it works great. First time ever having a 3DS and I have to say I am impressed with the unit overall. Great gift for someone who has to "pause" since you can do so by shutting the screen anytime. Certain games may still run a timer *Cough* Animal Crossing New Leaf Island Games *Cough* but overall it is pretty handy to have since you can stop and put it down anytime. Overall a fun system I would recommend to anyone who enjoys gaming on the go!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Michener

customer_reviews.title: SNES LOOOOOOOOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 3DS because of this design. For so many years I thought about wanting this. I researched buying snes covers for other DS's but it just didn't look right to me. I wanted this like official SNES made design and they actually made it, so happy. And the whole 3DS system is cool too. LOVE THIS! SO MUCH!
customer_reviews.author: Jamison

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn’t like nostalgia
customer_reviews.text: This keeps bringing back good memories. One ding it does get is that for memory it ONLY takes one kind of SD card and then only up to 32gb. (you have to format the 64gb and up drives on your computer before they work).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Price with a Classic Design
customer_reviews.text: I always loved the Nintendo DS systems and I even had every single one of them. This being the best one out of all of them. Although many probably won't like the fact that you can't change out the top plate like the original 3DS but I don't find it bothersome. As I did buy this edition for a reason. Besides that, the buttons are clicky and tactile which I like and the colors are really nice although not the exact same as the Super NES.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Sely

customer_reviews.title: Retro Skin with the best SNES game of all time...this ol gamer digs it
customer_reviews.text: I already had 2 3ds that I hardly ever played but bought this damn thing because I loved my SNES...super nostalgic. On top of that it included my favorite SNES game Super Mario Kart....nobody can touch me in that game....at least locally :D
customer_reviews.author: LoX

customer_reviews.title: cute and fun! (DOES NOT COME WITH CHARGER)
customer_reviews.text: originally i was planning on buying the pikachu version of the 3DS XL but the price kept going up and up so i decided to buy the cheapest one. this one. it works just fine but the only thing is that you need to unscrew the back with a #0 screw and fix the SD card. it isn’t THAT big of a deal but i’d assume that nintendo would’ve done that for me. anyways besides that, it plays my games just fine. you can play any 3ds game (i don’t know if you can play any older da games but i kind of doubt it).
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: It's a 3DS XL
customer_reviews.text: What else is there to say? It's a 3DS Xl and works as expected. Just a word of caution - both the upper and lower screen are REALLY soft & prone to scratches. Get yourself a tempered glass cover for the upper screen and a soft plastic screen protector for the lower BEFORE you ever turn it own or take it out of the box - you'll thank me later when it's full of scratches and you can replace the scratched surface instead of being stuck with it
customer_reviews.author: Gabba Hey

customer_reviews.title: Grew up in the 90s, SNES is best console
customer_reviews.text: Love the design, so nostalgic, SNES was the first system I got. Other than the design, it is a 3DS, good games, has 3d effect, XL, so the screen is nice. Got a few games and going through them, handheld console at its finest. 5/5
customer_reviews.author: Hai Time

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: Bought this while deployed and is my best/worthwhile purchase I’ve made in years. I stockpiled a bunch of the SNES games on it and switched the graphics to the original pixilation and I couldn’t be happier. Every time I play on it I have a grin on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son’s birthday and wasn’t disappointed. Even though I waited a little too long to shop, this came in plenty of time. Exactly as described and well-packaged. Reminded me of the SNES I got as a kid (and still have). My son was overjoyed and has been using it like crazy. I’m just glad we had an extra charging cord laying around, or this great gift may have been a bit of a bummer when he couldn’t use it right away!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Barbee

customer_reviews.title: 3d fan service
customer_reviews.text: Honestly the best purchase I've made in years. Now that it's been out for like a decade, there is a wealth of great titles to choose from. My favorite is sent an jaguar. Nothing like anime waifu boobs to perk you up on a boring day.
customer_reviews.author: ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Still best portable console
customer_reviews.text: I like the battery life and portability of this system over the Switch. I also like the huge game library and the fact that a lot of older games that I love are available on this system. I bought 3 of these for Xmas presents. 2 for kids and 1 for me. Even at the end of this consoles time, still exhausting great games and lots to offer for years to come. A lot less stress with my kids carrying around these vs the bigger non folding more expensive Nintendo Switch. We leave the switch at home.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Now you’re playing with power, Super Power!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome console. Hands down the best version they have made of the 3ds to date. I’ve owned the aqua and black launch editions, plus the galaxy version. This has the best styling and just looks and feels fantastic. Sure, nostalgia is playing a role here, but even the younger Nintendo fan will enjoy this. Did I mention it comes with a free download of Mario Kart? Awesome. Thanks for making this Nintendo!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Still great in 2018!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. The more I was playing games on my phone, the more I realized that the games were crap. And most were crap WITH ADS. The quality on the 3DS XL is outstanding and the 3d effect is very very cool. If 3d wears on you, you can instantly adjust to 2d anytime. Graphics on Mario, Luigi, Zelda games are absolutely incredible.
customer_reviews.author: muzixplorer

customer_reviews.title: Finally got a 3ds Xl!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the original 3ds on launch. Up till now I never upgraded to the XL. Very happy I did in every way. The screen is enormous compared to the original. The 3ds eye tracking makes the experience much clearer and enjoyable. I love the SNES detail on this 3ds. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: AVAEMPIRETop Contributor: Batman

customer_reviews.title: Not “new”. Used and without boxes/manuals
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a collector’s item to add to my collection. The item is listed as new and first and several listed photos shows the item clearly boxed. The 3DS came in bubble wrap with an ac adapter without any boxes or manuals. It’s not new but used and the last person who used it even left their WiFi connection name in registry. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Beector/Kreesha

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with how quickly the product was delivered. Packaged well and easy to open. Finally purchased my own Nintendo 3DS XL, looks great and works as described. I cannot complain.
customer_reviews.author: castilr

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great! That 3d will take a bit to get used to. Good thing you can turn it off. Got this so I can run a secondary town for Animal Crossing. I spent hundreds of hours on the last town, so I don't want to trash that, but now that I know more about the game, I want to start fresh.
customer_reviews.author: AMK

customer_reviews.title: Scratches on Screen!! ):
customer_reviews.text: product seemed new just by looking at the box but upon opening i noticed that there are a few scratches on the top screen and someone who expected a brand new product, i expect there not to be any marks or scratches upon opening, not to mention i haven’t even used it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend this product 100%
customer_reviews.text: I honestly haven't found anything to complain about. I recently purchased this 3DS for my little brother to have for Christmas. Even though I got this SNES edition due to my nostalgia, he still appreciated the style a lot. He's been playing it non-stop since this morning and hasn't found anything wrong with the screens, the performances of games, or the quality of the handheld. Would recommend this product 100%
customer_reviews.author: Richard Knight

customer_reviews.title: CHECK YOUR DS WHENYOU FIRST GET IT IN!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a NEW Nintendo 3DS XL super nes edition, but what i got is a used one that wouldn't even turn on. it was also missing the sty-less and the screens were covered in fingerprints. make sure to check and see if it works when you first get it in to avoid the crap i went though, it took me 6 months to get it taken care of. amazon did well and got me a new one due to this one being faulty. I'm glad amazon did so well on helping, but please make sure you check yours so you don't deal with any crap.
customer_reviews.author: Jason hill

customer_reviews.title: the super nintendo design was why i bought it
customer_reviews.text: feels much heavier than the 2ds xl and the screen flickers often, the super nintendo design was why i bought it . maybe mine was defective i don't know but to me the screen flickering was not right. have to return this product asap
customer_reviews.author: Michael Makris

customer_reviews.title: Love the 3DS XL
customer_reviews.text: Love the 3DS XL. Awesome visuals and plays great. The downloaded games work fantastic, however I am already having trouble with the card reader reading the games periodically and the system is only a coupe months old.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri Tremblay

customer_reviews.title: If you like it get it
customer_reviews.text: The looks aren't as good in person but it's still a great little system that people complement.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: SD Card not detected AND 3D Slider malfunction
customer_reviews.text: Bought two 3DS's for myself and my son. Imagine my surprise when not one but both were not working correctly. I never got a chance to even play on the thing. I will be ordering two NEW 3DS's as I don't have any confidence in the used products sold by Amazon. I also would like to point out that UPS put my delivery on the wrong doorstep. What a horrible experience this has been.
customer_reviews.author: k k

customer_reviews.title: Best New 3DS XL for the money
customer_reviews.text: Nostalgic and amazing. I absolutely love this New 3DS XL. The only caveat is that it doesn't come with a charger, so you will want to add one with your order. Nintendo assumes you already owned a 3DS at some point in your life, so they think you already have one. The screen is not as nice as some of the other newer models but not enough to be noticeable or pay more for.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Nave

customer_reviews.title: A great device for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this device for a discounted price of 150$ the built quality is great and the variety of games is astonishing! No reason not to pick up this device for 150$ defenitly worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Ido S.

customer_reviews.title: No charger, but mint condition
customer_reviews.text: I would give it 5 stars if it came with a charger. It does say that it doesn't come with ine so I can't fault the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Mirrorwolf

customer_reviews.title: Super Nintendo nostalgia
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping. Got item before Christmas even though was expected after. This is my first DS. Not too difficult to install super Mario kart. So far the 3ds is working well. Just need to buy a game in 3D.
customer_reviews.author: jess05nurseTX

customer_reviews.title: Classic !!
customer_reviews.text: Very cool design. I bought it because I am a sucker for special edition game consoles and I love retro games. This 3ds has more of a matted finish and even comes with a free download of Super Mario Kart, an awesome Super NES classic ! If you love retro games, I highly recommend this 3ds.
customer_reviews.author: Katharine L.

customer_reviews.title: I love it! And I love SNES Mario Kart!
customer_reviews.text: Once you get the hang of it, the original MK is a lot of fun for those who love the series but never played that far back. All I need now is the gba one. Anyways the console looks great, the box is pretty, and it feels and runs perfectly. The only concern I have is with my warranty what would ever happen if it broke and I had to transfer my downloaded games... including the mk... but who knows. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Dexter

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful style of 3DS, I got 2, one for me, one for my partner. At first he thought it was too grey and I said well, this is how an SNES looked like... and once he opened it he fell in love with it, not too grey (lol) Anyway, love the next day delivery, love the feel of smoothness around it.
customer_reviews.author: Choi Sam-Won

customer_reviews.title: Great system
customer_reviews.text: My son got this for Christmas and absolutely loves it. It comes with an old school (SNES) Mario Kart game. Didn’t include a charger, but we got an Amazon Basics one for like $8 and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Chinorican

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My boy loves his 3DS, and I love the throwback design to my all time favorite Super Nintendo. Works great, and there are a wide variety of games that he can now play with this system.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Holman

customer_reviews.title: Haven’t used yet
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this four stars simply because it hasn’t been used yet as it is a gift for my daughter for Xmas. I did take it out of the box and it is brand new as expected. Will update review after Xmas.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Pond

customer_reviews.title: Simply everything is perfect
customer_reviews.text: It arrived to Saudi save, workd perfectly, and it deliverd before the due date which is awesome. And yes the price for this new 3DS XL is the best on Amazon compare to different editions/models sold on the website. All is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: 90's boy

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had nothing but problems with this and he has only had it since Christmas ( less than a month) do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: SimplyAtomic

customer_reviews.title: Awesome style, loving the NEW 3DS features
customer_reviews.text: Worth the upgrade to 'NEW' version if you're a 3DS fan and use the 3D. The design is great if you grew up in the SNES era. I got mine from Amazon Warehouse and it's basically new.
customer_reviews.author: jackelope

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Best gift I’ve bought myself in years only downside is you need to unscrew the back cover to change memory card
customer_reviews.author: pedro

customer_reviews.title: Super Great
customer_reviews.text: Great consle. The games are fun and snes edition is a nice finish. I’m not too good at super mario kart, but i have to say, this came in good condition, and was perfect at the beggining. It’s awesome and such a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: The Zentners

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a Super Nintendo
customer_reviews.text: Solid New 3DS. Nothing different other than the cool paint job that looks like and old Super Nintendo. Would have cooler if the button on the outside were sculpted instead of just a picture, but it is still neatly retro.
customer_reviews.author: M. Harp

customer_reviews.title: 3D is AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: My Nintendo 3DS XL just arrived yesterday! And I must say I am very pleased with the product. The 3D is just AWESOME. I have also bought Super Mario 3D Land game and I live everything about the games and specially the Nintendo 3DS XL SNES is really great! I highly recommend this new upgrade for Nintendo.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: One Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: Amazon is an awesome company. They always have went above and beyond to make sure I am always satisfied with the end result. Very happy with this new Nintendo 3ds xl SNES classic edition. My son will be very surprised on Christmas morning when he gets to open this up. Amazon offered a great price for this item!
customer_reviews.author: whitney freeman

customer_reviews.title: I bought this when they sold out of the one ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when they sold out of the one my husband wanted on another site. He loves the SNES look of this model. I'm mildly jealous as I have the plain black one. Oh well. That's what cases are for, right?
customer_reviews.author: Averey

customer_reviews.title: Fun with a Good Design
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! I love the purple buttons. The larger screen is so nice on the 3ds XL as well. Having to screw the back off to get to the SD card isn’t fun, but i couldn’t resist the wonderful design! 3ds is my favorite console of all time too: so many of my favorite games on here!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price get it while you can!
customer_reviews.text: Good for price and I absolutely LOVE it. The classic design is a nice touch. The upgrade is built a lot better, very sturdy. I broke my last old 3ds so this was nice and refreshing. Price was amazing and I saved a lot of money.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool! Daughter loved it but she noticed the top screen was kinda crappy resolution compared to her friends
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming device.
customer_reviews.text: My son 7, got this for Christmas and considering the price was the lowest around compared to box and other internet store we are very happy. There are more bells and whistles then I will understand about it but my son is happy and it has worked great for his needs. Graphics are excellent and easy to get used to, use of games understandable too.
customer_reviews.author: KBKB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 3DS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing size, awesome buttons, big screen, easy grip. Perfect 3DS, especially for someone who grew up in the 90’s with a SNES! Do not hesitate to buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Extremely satisfied. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This was bought as a gift for my daughter. It looks awesome. Very well made. Works perfectly. It is used daily. She was very happy and excited to receive it.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I probably ordered this design more for myself because I'm a 90s kid. I love the old super mario kart. My kids needed a new 3ds so win win for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy.
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift and it’s such a nice system. I fell in love with the artwork itself but the 3DS was really nice compared to other models I’ve tried. Still in great shape as well.
customer_reviews.author: alex92701

customer_reviews.title: A Surge of Power is Heading Your Way!!!
customer_reviews.text: As a classic Nintendo fan boy, this 3DS fires on all levels. I play my old handhelds every once in a while, but this is the first Nintendo hand held system I’ve bought since the original DS was released. There’s lots of stories to catch up on, so I’m stoked!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Super Cool Design!
customer_reviews.text: It's the new 3DS but it looks like a SNES! What more can I say? Great system, thousands of great games. If you haven't purchased one yet then you're missing out!
customer_reviews.author: Cronologic

customer_reviews.title: For The Retro Dads!
customer_reviews.text: Looks fantastic, comes with snes super Mario cart. Solid performer no issues whatsoever good battery life. Looks amazing I had the Samus edition sold it and got this. Has a great retro feel does not feel super glossy like the samus edition. Feels great in hand with or without a grip. Buy it now you won't be sorry, especially at $150
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why the 3DS is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This handheld is one of the best I’ve ever owned. It has amazing face tracking 3d and has really fast processesing power. I would recommend this to anybody from casual to serious gamers.
customer_reviews.author: Norah M

customer_reviews.title: It's great
customer_reviews.text: Came in great condition, sucks it didn't have a charger but I got one. Runs smoothly, has a nice outter finish, and easy to transport.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: YES!!!!!!1!!1!
customer_reviews.text: I love this 3DS!!! The SNES Edition looks fantastic! It is so much faster than my old 3DS.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix Dracul

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Love this edition 3DS. Works perfect, no problems. Pretty much expected with Nintendo products.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: I would buy another one
customer_reviews.text: It was good. I was kinda doubting if I should buy 3DS in Amazon but it turned out to be good, especially when it was on discount by 25%. I also don't have to worry about it being full of finger prints. Finally the design was cooler than the other 3DS XL design.
customer_reviews.author: Keane Andrei

customer_reviews.title: looks cool, works great
customer_reviews.text: looks cool, works great, the added benefit of being able to move around and it still be 3d doesnt seem to work for pokemon Y
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful present for a 9 year old
customer_reviews.text: I don't "love it", I don't even know how to turn it on and off. But my 9 year old grandson loves it and that's all that matters.
customer_reviews.author: lee westmoreland

customer_reviews.title: Best New 3DS XL for old school gamers
customer_reviews.text: I’ll be honest. I was 6 years old when I got to play Super Mario Bros. for the first time on the NES. And I was 10 when Super Mario World was released on the SNES. Growing up with both consoles, having a new 3DS XL look like something from the old school is a trip down memory lane. I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Alfonso R Ochoa

customer_reviews.title: 5 year old son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the 3DS XL!!! **I am still waiting for the warranty I ordered to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay J

customer_reviews.title: Much better 3D than original
customer_reviews.text: The new 3DS tracks your face so well! Much improved from the original 3DS. I love the Super Nintendo theme. Has extra buttons I haven’t needed to use yet but at least Nintendo is thinking ahead and possibly keeping the future alive for this awesome system.
customer_reviews.author: Zach the Outdoor Addict

customer_reviews.title: So far my kids love these. They do get a little dizzy while ...
customer_reviews.text: So far my kids love these. They do get a little dizzy while using the 3D feature but you can turn it down or off.
customer_reviews.author: fernando

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty awesome mobile console. SNES was a big part of my childhood, so this gives me a lot of nostalgia. I had a 2DS and did a system transfer and got all of my stuff. Has a nice big sceen and feels comfortable while I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 6 year old grandson
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6 year old grandson, he loves it, it's easy enough for him to use without help, holds charge well and provides hours of entertainment
customer_reviews.author: lynneb

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item
customer_reviews.text: There is a big difference between a Super Nintendo Classic, and a New Nintendo 3D XL. Child was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Voltairine

customer_reviews.title: Best 3ds..
customer_reviews.text: Best 3ds yet. The stable 3d is a massive difference ( i have both)
customer_reviews.author: Uva

customer_reviews.title: The Best 3DS period
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I snagged one of these SNES style NEW 3DS XLs before the 3DS got discontinued. I love 3D but the small viewing angle on the original 3DS XL was brutal. This is so much more forgiving and comfortable to use! I love the SNES aesthetic. Reminds me of playing my brand new 3DS on Christmas morning!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan D. Payne

customer_reviews.title: Only one
customer_reviews.text: I think that guarantees the most modern computer chip. Most suppliers sneak in the old chip.
customer_reviews.author: M. Benson

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact game machine
customer_reviews.text: 3D is surprisingly good. A great device for social gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Sergey Solyanik

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT COME WITH AC ADAPTER
customer_reviews.text: My mistake for assuming this thing came with an AC adapter, hopefully someone else does not make the same mistake
customer_reviews.author: DisgruntledBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, and put a big smile on the lucky kid that got this for x-mas.
customer_reviews.author: luke

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgic
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I have been a Nintendo fan since I was a kid, playing an actual Super Nintendo. The nostalgic nature of this design brings it back for sure.
customer_reviews.author: P. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Classic SNES games on the go
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can now play the best SNES games from the Nintendo Virtual Console Library on a hand-held system. I wish that the system came with a charger.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Lee

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Had the day 1,original 3ds for so long. This is so much bigger and the picture is great. Works just like any other 3ds.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: The New Nintendo 3ds is a great system!
customer_reviews.text: I grew up playing Nintendo and love it. This is a great 3ds with the old Super Nintendo look. This is the first 3DS I've purchased and it's worth it. It's an older system but the great thing is there are so many great games you can buy.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick H

customer_reviews.title: Awesome 3ds...
customer_reviews.text: It looks like a mini SNES and comes with Mario kart, what more could you want? It's a 3ds and does its job well even if the switch is taking over.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Best Handheld Console!
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend the 3DS because it has a better library than PS Vita. Graphics wise, PS Vita is definitely better.

product_meta.title: Nintendo New 3DS XL - Super NES Edition + Super Mario Kart for SNES
product_meta.description: Edition:SNES Classic| Configuration:without AC AdapterThe New Nintendo 3DS XL system combines next-generation portable gaming with super-stable 3D technology and added control features. Take 3D photos, connect with friends, and enhance your gaming experiences with added amiibo support. The New Nintendo 3DS XL system plays all Nintendo DS games. Nintendo DS games will not appear in 3D. AC adapter sold separately. New Nintendo 3DS XL uses the same AC adapter as the Nintendo DSi, Nintendo 3DS and Nintendo 2DS systems. 3D Mode recommended for Ages 7+ Includes download code for Super Mario Kart (Super NES). Battery endurance: The battery endurance times are estimates. They will vary depending on factors such as the software being played, the amount of data received by wireless communication, and the ambient temperature. Using the camera features may also reduce the battery endurance times shown below. The screen brightness setting affects the battery endurance time. Keeping brightness at lower settings can prolong battery life. If you tap power-saving mode ON, screen brightness and color gradation will automatically adjusted to match the displayed images, and battery consumption will be limited even further. If you put the system in Sleep Mode when not using it, you can reduce power consumption while still being able to send and receive information from StreetPass and SpotPass via the wireless communication features. If the system is fully charged and put into Sleep Mode, the system’s battery endurance time in Sleep Mode is roughly 3 days. The power LED slowly brightens and darkens while the system is in Sleep Mode. NOTE: Depending on the software you are using, sometimes pushing the Sleep switch will not cause the system to enter Sleep Mode. In these cases the power LED will remain steadily lit. (For example, when listening to music with Nintendo 3DS Sound.)
feature_bullets: The New Nintendo 3DS XL system combines next generation portable gaming
The New Nintendo 3DS XL system plays all Nintendo DS games; Nintendo DS games will not appear in 3D
AC adapter sold separately; New Nintendo 3DS XL uses the same AC adapter as the Nintendo DSi, Nintendo 3DS and Nintendo 2DS systems
3D Mode can be switched on and off and is recommended for Ages 7+
Includes download code for Super Mario Kart (Super NES)
